t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 2 weeks ago - The Information earlier reported the news. Prior to the agreement, a limited selection of Nike products were available on Amazon via third-party sellers. But Nike was a "gated" brand on Amazon, meaning it was highly restricted to prevent counterfeit and low-quality items.

t: Amazon brand statistics rank ecommerce, digital shelf analytics
